sentences.sentence: A diabolically evil or wicked person.
sentences.translation: 残酷邪恶并且野蛮的人。

sentences.sentence: Diabolically set up an email contact schedule after first contact.
sentences.translation: 在第一次见面之后就应该建立后续接触的时间表。

sentences.sentence: There are no greys in his picture of the world; everything is either diabolically black or celestially white.
sentences.translation: 他们的世界没有灰色，只有愤怒的黑和神圣的白。
